item.description:
We know your design skills rock, but that doesn't mean you know how to code a website! Come meet the Wix.com team and learn how to make your website shine!

In this 1 hour long class you'll learn how easy it is to build a fully custom website without seeing a line of code!

We'll go over
- Best practices for portfolio building
- Image galleries
- Search Engine Optimization (get found on Google!)
- Social Media Marketing
- Online Stores
- and more!

After the class there will be 1 hour of networking, so you can mingle with other amazing designers and local small business owners who may need your ninja-lika design skills.

RSVP via eventbrite http://bit.ly/wixboston

If you have any questions email ariele@wix.com

group.name: The Boston Graphic Design Meetup Group

item.name: You CAN Build a Website! Put Your Work Online! (and Network)
